ModMetaData.name: Quality Furniture Matters
ModMetaData.author: Dakota Copas
ModMetaData.description:
Makes the quality of end tables and dressers matter by adding rest effectiveness bonuses to linked beds.
Features Quality-based rest effectiveness bonuses from linked end tables and dressers:
Quality Rest Effectiveness Bonus Awful -2% Poor -1% Normal 0% Good +1% Excellent +2% Masterwork +4% Legendary +8%
Linkable limits per bed:
Max 1 Dresser Max 2 End Tables
Maximum potential bonus: With 2 legendary end tables + 1 legendary dresser = +24% rest effectiveness
